Posts.EditableText:
Hi all,

Can't believe I've found a place where interactive fiction is thriving, there's an active bunch of people and in the UK to boot! :D

Adam
Posts.HTML:
Hi all,

Can't believe I've found a place where interactive fiction is thriving, there's an active bunch of people and in the UK to boot! :D

Adam

Posts.EditableText: The UK has a thriving IF scene. Emily Short [posts updates](https://emshort.blog/2017/05/15/mid-may-link-assortment/) with regularity. But online, you've come to one of the most active and friendly venues. Welcome, and enjoy your stay!
Posts.HTML: The UK has a thriving IF scene. Emily Short posts updates with regularity. But online, you've come to one of the most active and friendly venues. Welcome, and enjoy your stay!

Posts.EditableText:
we're a small but very helpful (or at least we try to be helpful - speaking of myself, lol) and friendly community here at quest

though, we're transitioning as the founder/owner Alex has moved on with his life, and the new team is still working on transitioning and getting up to speed, with the site/forum, servers/online games, and further quest development.
Posts.HTML:
